definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
key (on a piano or computer keyboard)/button (on a mouse or other device)/chemical bond/linchpin

sentences.english: Press to get to the router prompt.
sentences.chinese: 按下回車鍵進入路由器提示符狀態。

sentences.english: To terminate the keyboard mode, type the command return then press the Return key.
sentences.chinese: 結束鍵盤模式，可以通過在命令提示框值輸入回車鍵。

sentences.english: The Return key selects the currently highlighted item.
sentences.chinese: 回車鍵用來選擇當前高亮顯示的項目。

sentences.english: Whenever prompted for input, hit Enter to accept the default value.
sentences.chinese: 每當提示需要輸入時，按回車鍵接受默認值。

sentences.english: When done, click on the OK button or hit the Enter key.
sentences.chinese: 當你做了，點擊‘確定’按鈕或敲擊回車鍵。

sentences.english: Just press the Enter key at the prompt.
sentences.chinese: 只需在提示符上按下回車鍵。

sentences.english: Please try using your mouse when the next screen appears.
sentences.chinese: 敲回車鍵後，對鼠標的測試開始，屏幕上顯示。

sentences.english: The Enter or Return key now "presses" a single selected Action Button.
sentences.chinese: 輸入或回車鍵現在是“按”單一選擇動作按鈕。

sentences.english: Following screen is shown, then Push Enter key.
sentences.chinese: 下面的畫面顯示，然後推回車鍵。
